h:head.h:title: Vital Signs Farm Field Soils Yields Maize Survey – 13 February 2015 v1

text.value: Low soil fertility / other soil problems
Plant grown in association with other crops (intercropped)

bind.calculate: concat(if( /FarmFieldSoils_Yields_Maize_v1/a_group/m1_group/m1_a_5 = '1', 'M1 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_Yields_Maize_v1/a_group/m2_group/m2_a_5 = '1', 'M2 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_Yields_Maize_v1/a_group/m3_group/m3_a_5 = '1', 'M3 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_Yields_Maize_v1/a_group/m4_group/m4_a_5 = '1', 'M4 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_Yields_Maize_v1/a_group/m5_group/m5_a_5 = '1', 'M5 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_Yields_Maize_v1/a_group/m6_group/m6_a_5 = '1', 'M6 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_Yields_Maize_v1/a_group/m7_group/m7_a_5 = '1', 'M7 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_Yields_Maize_v1/a_group/m8_group/m8_a_5 = '1', 'M8 ', ''))

concat(if( /FarmFieldSoils_Yields_Maize_v1/a_group/m1_group/m1_a_6 = '1', 'M1 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_Yields_Maize_v1/a_group/m2_group/m2_a_6 = '1', 'M2 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_Yields_Maize_v1/a_group/m3_group/m3_a_6 = '1', 'M3 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_Yields_Maize_v1/a_group/m4_group/m4_a_6 = '1', 'M4 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_Yields_Maize_v1/a_group/m5_group/m5_a_6 = '1', 'M5 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_Yields_Maize_v1/a_group/m6_group/m6_a_6 = '1', 'M6 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_Yields_Maize_v1/a_group/m7_group/m7_a_6 = '1', 'M7 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_Yields_Maize_v1/a_group/m8_group/m8_a_6 = '1', 'M8 ', ''))

bind.jr:constraintMsg: You must select an eligible first field. If there is none, select None.
You must select an eligible second field. If there is none, select None.
The first and second fields must be different. Go back and correct the selected fields.
Go back and correct surface condition values so they add up to 10.
Go back and correct surface condition values so they add up to 10.
